suppress.notes: okhttp uses certificate pinning which some claim and others dispute can allow a man-in-the-middle attack
Kotlin script is not used in the Sudo Platform Entitlements SDK. Set suppression to expire in 2 months. We can re-evaluate and possible move to Kotlin 1.4.0 if it's out of RC by then.
Guava temporary file creation is not used in the Sudo Entitlements SDK.
False positive. We're at Kotlin 1.4.30 which is beyond 1.4.21 when fix was available. False positive occurs because the kotlin coroutines libraries are at 1.4.2 and match the broad CPE pattern.
vulnerability is A comparison error in OpenBSDBCrypt.checkPassword(). checkPassword is not used.
vulnerability is in log4j SMTP appender dependency of kotlin-analysis-intellij - this is a gradle plugin.
